content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal experiences or physically visit restaurants. I exist solely to provide information, answer questions, and assist with tasks through text-based conversations.

However, I'd love to hear about your experience at the new vegan Thai place! If you do end up trying it out, feel free to come back and share your thoughts, opinions, and recommendations. I'm always here to chat and help with any questions or topics you'd like to discuss!
